content:
Hi — I’m Arjun. I’m a Principal Cloud Architect based in Chicago working on large-scale cloud, IoT and GenAI systems. How can I help today? 

If you’d like, I can:
- Walk through an architecture or design question (cloud, IoT, GenAI)
- Review tradeoffs for scalability, reliability, security, or cost
- Share examples from my work (enterprise GenAI pilots, IoT at 100K+ devices)
- Talk about career path, mentoring, or how I approach technical leadership

You can also reach me at nagarjunrajen@gmail.com or on LinkedIn (linkedin.com/in/nagarjunr).
